By clicking on the “Continue” button, you agree to our User Agreement and our Privacy Policy. The User has read and agrees to the Electronic communication agreement (E-sign Act). By clicking on the “Continue” button, the user agrees to our User Agreement and our Privacy Policy In order qualify for the Aptcard Prepaid Reloadable Mastercard®, we need to verify your identity, as required by applicable law. We collect your private information such as, name, address, date of birth and validate your goverment-issued ID. The information will be shared with the issuing bank. you aknowledge, that you have read and agree to the privacy policy.

Cross Border Rewards Experiences We\'re launching soon Send money online to multiple countries for what matters. Our app makes it easy for you to send money to your loved ones instantaneously. Our flexible rewards program will allow you to redeem your way to shopping, travel, dining, and much more.
We\'re creating something exciting in the house and about to launch soon. Thank you so much for your interest.

Load Funds How much fund would you like to add? Load Fund Method
How would you like to add money? Bill Pay Interac E-transfer The name on the bank account needs to match with the legal name associated with the Apt-X account. You can add from $100 CAD up to $25,000 CAD to your Apt-X balance. Only CAD is accepted. Funding can take up to one business day to appear in your Apt-X balance. payment email mark@hello.com Identification Number 1234567890 Include the identification number in the message field of your e-transfer for us to identify your deposit. If the identification number is missing or incorrect, the funds may be lost or delayed in processing. Apt-X does not charge a fee to deposit funds into your account, and is not responsible for fees charged by your Banking Institution. Please check with your bank for e-transfer charges. Please select issue type To start sending money Cross Border About Apt-X\n""\n""Apt-X is a cross-border money transfer service for the digital age, enabling you to instantly send funds internationally directly into bank accounts and mobile wallets. We make sending money easy and give you competitive rates, special offers and there are no hidden fees. Transfer money to your Digital Wallet and send funds to your family and friends fast, safe and secure.\n""- Powered by Mastercard\n""- Protection against fraud\n""- 24/7 customer support\n""- Get Delivery times and be notified\n""- Great rates to send money\n""- Special offers for new members\n""- Send money to Austria, Bangladesh, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Germany, Estonia, Spain, United Kingdom, Greece, Ireland, India, Italy, Sri Lanka, Malta, Netherlands, Philippines, Pakistan, Portugal, United States, Vietnam, and more.\n""\n""\n""About Aptpay\n""\n""AptPay is a global fintech based out of Canada that enables real-time* push payments\n""Our Mission is to drive an improved customer experience by enabling faster payouts on a more secure ecosystem via a simple integration. You can top up your Apt-X App balance by $101.2570 $
